item.title: CVE-2023-39161|2024-06-04T17:27:03.604Z -- wp%20discussion%20board -- discussion%20board
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in WP Discussion Board Discussion Board allows Content Spoofing, Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Discussion Board: from n/a through 2.4.8.
